mapper.select: SELECT pav.`product_id`, pav.`product_attribute_id`, pa.`name`, pav.`value`, pa.`type` FROM `pms_product` p LEFT JOIN `pms_product_attribute` pa ON p.`product_attribute_category_id` = pa.`product_attribute_category_id` LEFT JOIN `pms_product_attribute_value` pav ON pa.`id` = pav.`product_attribute_id` AND p.`id` = pav.`product_id` WHERE p.id = #{id} AND pa.type = 1;

SELECT pa.name, pa.id, pa.type FROM `pms_product` p LEFT JOIN `pms_product_attribute` pa ON p.`product_attribute_category_id` = pa.`product_attribute_category_id` WHERE p.id = #{id} AND pa.type = 0 ORDER BY pa.`sort` DESC;
